game_description: Doggo Dash is an up-and-coming game that focuses on fun and quality. In this game, you get to explore many different maps each with a unique experience and adventure to have with you and your friends! In this multiplayer experience, you run around and play as a cute dog you can dress up and make yourself the most fashionable dog there is, show off your look to other people or chill with your style! Treat yourself to some virtual food and roam with a new virtual pet you choose at the pet shop! play around on the main map! We are devoted to making a fun engaging experience that is frequently getting updated and better. There's only so much you can find in a description hop in and find the experiences and memories that can only be found by trying for yourself!
review_1: It is a good game but I can’t get into the discord because I can’t type the link can you post it in the description or under this post also I remember the pickle cosmetic someone won so it would be nice if you added that for him
review_2: They spent months to remodel the game and make it better. I was happy once they released it and it is trash the old version was 10x better than this version. This game is for sure a waste of time and space on your oculus.
review_4: I used to be a moderator for this game kinda like how I was one of the creators for polar climb and the others didn't credit me for making the music besides that the older version of this game was more fun idk what culliswullis did but plz change it back
review_5: The colors are too bright and I can’t really see when I’m on a tree Maybe just turn the brightness a little down because then it will be easier for￼￼ people to see
